product.name: CoverGirl Ink It! By Perfect Point Plus Violet Ink
product.description: The CoverGirl Ink It! By Perfect Point Plus gives you vibrant, high impact color that glides on smoothly with pen-like precision for intense eye looks that last all day.Features:Crease and fade resistantSelf-sharpening pencilWaterproofApplication Tips: Start at the inner corner of your eye and draw a line close to your lash line.
